summary: This bill, the Artificial Intelligence Public Awareness and Education Campaign Act, mandates the Secretary of Commerce to establish a public awareness campaign concerning the benefits, risks, and prevalence of artificial intelligence in daily life. The campaign will educate the public on AI consumer literacy, best practices for detecting digital media provenance, specialized use cases, and workforce opportunities related to AI. The Secretary will consult with stakeholders, disseminate materials, and report annually on the campaign's progress, which will sunset five years after enactment. No additional funds are appropriated.
